resources.string: To disable this restriction, please refer to corresponding setting in Insular.

When Insular is activated, you may see "device is managed by your organization" or similar information around the system UI. It's the standard transparency notice of Android for Work (the underlying Android feature used by Insular), which cannot be removed.

Island does not collect your personal information in any means, see our privacy policy on Google Play Store for details.

If you get message "xxx feature disabled by admin", you may have enabled one of the restriction features in Insular, please refer to corresponding setting in Insular.

To uninstall Insular, you must deactivate it first, go to Insular - Settings - Setup & Shutdown - Click the "X" icon besides "Mainland".
App Ops was not preserved due to internal error.
